book.chapter:
Overview
Anyframe Open Deployment Environment (Oden hereafter)
Oden uses Java technology including OSGi and Eclipse, and pursues open architecture that can be easily extended. Also, it support various platform environments such as UNIX, Mac OS X, and Microsoft Windows.
Continuous Integration: Reduces or helps reduce the software delivery time by integrating/automating procedures that include build, test, and deploy.
Deploy management tool that enables application components built through CI environment or various configuration files, web files, etc. to be conveniently deployed. This chapter provides simple introductions on the development background of Oden and main characteristics.
